name: Sail DevContainer
postCreateCommand: if [ ! -d /workspaces/spark/.git ]; then git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/apache/spark.git /workspaces/spark; fi && hatch env create default && . ${containerWorkspaceFolder}/.venvs/default/bin/activate && pip install --upgrade pip && echo 'source ${containerWorkspaceFolder}/.venvs/default/bin/activate' >> ~/.bashrc
